Welcome!

This is a simple Battleships game, with a difficulty selector for you to use, and once you clcik the Start game button, the ships will be randomly placed on each board, and you and the computer will take turns trying to sink each others ships! Click on the opponents grid to select the co-ordinates you wish to attack, grey means you missed, red indicates a hit.

Happy hunting!
